title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 810.8 - Conditions of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 810.8 - Conditions of award

State Regulations
(a) Grants awarded under this Part are subject to the following conditions: (1)

The grantee may not materially change the
quality, nature or duration of the project unless the written approval of the
board is obtained prior to the change. (2)

The grantee shall submit project progress
reports to the department in the form prescribed and at such times as
requested. (3)

The grantee must
submit proof in the form requested by the department for a group of
expenditures made under a grant funded pursuant to this Part. A grantee shall
expend funds it receives under this Part solely in accordance with the approved
application and budget, the regulations of this Part and the terms and
conditions of the grant award. (4)

The board may impose additional conditions prior to the award of any grant
under this Part if it is determined by the board that the conditions are
necessary to carry out the purpose of the grant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
810.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
